snippet.title: Portal Your Friends - Ninjump Dash
snippet.description:
Use the mysterious Portal Power to transport your friends behind in the online multiplayer race - Ninjump Dash

NinJump Dash is a realtime, multiplayer racing game featuring your favourite characters from NinJump, the mega-hit game enjoyed by millions of players around the world. 

Features
* Race real people in real-time including your Facebook friends.
* Grab awesome powerups like Rockets, Shurikens, Portals and many more to use against your opponents.
* Unlock Boost Cards as you progress to give your powers an added punch.
* Run, Jump and Double Jump across beautiful hand crafted levels.
* Outfit your character in pirate garb, robot gear, the female ninja look, a chicken suit and other fun costumes.
* Join leagues for a chance to win mega prizes every single day.
